scripts.popup-dev: cp -r chrome/public popup && cd popup && pnpm i && react-scripts start --no-inline-scripts
scripts.chrome-build: cp -r chrome/public popup && cd popup && pnpm i && react-scripts build --no-inline-scripts && rm -r public && cd .. && node build-chrome.js && cd popup && rm -r build
scripts.firefox-build: cp -r firefox/public popup && cd popup && pnpm i && react-scripts build --no-inline-scripts && rm -r public && node build-firefox.js && rm -r build
scripts.test: cp -r chrome/public popup && cd popup && pnpm i && react-scripts build --no-inline-scripts && rm -r public && cd .. && node build-chrome.js && cd popup
